description: '''Bangladeshi hip hop''' is a genre of music and culture that covers a variety of styles of [[hip-hop]] music developed in [[Bangladesh]]. It is heavily influenced by American hip hop, and started in the early 1990s. In recent years, artists have used lyrical expressions for cultural identity, with lyrics addressing Bangladesh's political and social problems, lifestyles, nature, cultures, and communities. Hip hop in today's era has had great impact in Bangladesh.
